DRAGON_FLAGON.Settings_GmOnly_Hint: Only show the user login/logout messages to the GM.
DRAGON_FLAGON.Settings_NotMe_Title: Don't show my own to me
DRAGON_FLAGON.Settings_NotMe_Hint: Only show your login/logout messages to others, and not to yourself.
DRAGON_FLAGON.Settings_Delay_Hint: How many seconds should a login/logout message be kept in the log?
DRAGON_FLAGON.Settings_SelfDestruct_Hint: Messages will automatically delete themselves from the chat log after defined amount of time.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg2: {{username}} just joined. Can I get a heal?
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg4: {{username}} joined. You must construct additional pylons.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg8: Welcome, {{username}}. We hope you brought pizza.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg9: Welcome {{username}}. Leave your weapons by the door.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg12: Brace yourselves. {{username}} just joined the server.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg14: {{username}} just arrived. Seems OP - please nerf.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg16: A {{username}} has spawned in the server.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg20: {{username}} just showed up. Hold my beer.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg22: It's a bird! It's a plane! Nevermind, it's just {{username}}.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg24: Never gonna give {{username}} up. Never gonna let {{username}} down.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg25: Ha! {{username}} has joined! You activated my trap card!
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg29: It's dangerous to go alone, take {{username}}!
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg30: {{username}} has joined the server! It's super effective!
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg32: {{username}} is here, as the prophecy foretold.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg35: {{username}} is here to kick butt and chew bubblegum. And {{username}} is all out of gum.
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg36: Hello. Is it {{username}} you're looking for?
DRAGON_FLAGON.LoginMsg37: Roses are red, violets are blue, {{username}} joined this server with you
